mapper.insert: insert into person ( personId, personName, email, password, activateCode) values ( #{personId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activateCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select from person p where p.personName = #{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or p.email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update person p set p.status = #{newStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where p.status = #{oldStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: p.personId, p.personName, p.sex, p.birthday, p.email, p.createtime, p.password, p.status, p.sealedDays
